title: Japan’s 20-Year Government Bond Sale Has Investors on Edge
description: Investors are on tenterhooks ahead of an auction of 20-year Japanese sovereign bonds Tuesday after the government’s plans for tax relief on food jolted the market.
content: Investors are on tenterhooks ahead of an auction of 20-year Japanese sovereign bonds Tuesday after the government’s plans for tax relief on food jolted the market.
